segments.text: What's the weather like there today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's really cold . It snowed all day and the school closed early .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's 20 degrees below zero now . It was even colder this morning .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you heard what the weather is going to be like tomorrow ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I was watching the news a little earlier . They said it's probably going to snow tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I really don't like the winter . I wish it were summer .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Me too . How's the weather where you are ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's not too bad , but it's pretty cold here too . I heard it's going to be a little warmer tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S1
